title: What Are the Ideal Hours for a Cigar Store to Be Open? - The After Show
itunes:title: What Are the Ideal Hours for a Cigar Store to Be Open? - The After Show
description:
If it were up to you, what hours would you want a cigar shop to be open? What is the right thing for cigar shop owners? Is there some number of hours that makes the most sense for the business?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
